name: Hell - Mate
description:
Game Overview :

You are a famous stuntman HELL - MATE ! and he is going to perform his greatest stunt EVER and the limit is SKY HIGH. Hell - Mate is endless jumping game, the aim is to get the highest score possible. In between your journey you will be facing multiple obstruction, will Hell-Mate be able to dodge them all ?

Gameplay and Controls :
  • Jump: Use space to jump 
  • Power Jump: Press space on Booster are to perform power jump
  • Health: Hell - Mate can survive up to 2 arrow hits as he gets hit by 3rd one he will die
  • Scoring : Try to get as high as possible to set new high score!
Development Team :
  • Game Programmer: Arjun Kapoor
  • Game Designer/Artist: Maahi Likhari
  • Game Designer: Gurpreet Singh
